title: APV
body: Welcome to the Veterinary Appointment Management System, a comprehensive platform designed to simplify and optimize appointment management for veterinary professionals. This project, developed with MERN technology, offers an efficient and easy to use solution to organize the pet care schedule.

title: GymGT
body: GymGT, presents an attractive landing page designed to immerse fitness enthusiasts in a unique experience. That's why we have created a fluid and attractive platform to guarantee an excellent user experience.

title: CarGT
body: CarGT, is a landing page where a catalog of vehicles is shown. In this project, the information shown in the catalog is obtained by consuming the Cars by API-Ninjas API, obtained from Rapid API.

title: CalendarApp
body: CalendarApp, is a calendar application that allows you to create events and save them in a database. This project was developed with MERN technology.

title: InventoryApp
body: InventoryApp, is a web application that allows to manage the stock of a store. In this app you can perform CRUD operations with all types of products. This project is made with the MERN stack.
